flavor: "People rely on me to do my job. A few odd fish in the water don't change that."
name: Marion Tavares
text:
You have 1 fewer hand slots.
[reaction] After you play an event during your turn: Draw 1 card. Then, you may play a different event. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Search the top 3 cards of your deck for an event and draw it. Shuffle your deck.

name: Determined
text:
Marion Tavares deck only.
If this skill test is successful and it is on an event you played, you may return Determined to your hand instead of discarding it.

name: "I'll do it myself"
text: Revelation - Put "I'll do it myself" into play in your threat area. As an additional cost for you to play an event, take 1 horror. [fast] Discard 3 events from your hand: Discard "I'll do it myself."

flavor: "I'm just glad all my dreams have stayed in my head."
name: Lucius Galloway
text:
[reaction] After you successfully evade an enemy by 2 or more: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1 for each enemy at your location.

name: Agatha Crane
text:
[reaction] When your turn ends, if you sealed, canceled, or ignored 1 or more chaos tokens this round: Play a [[Spell]] or [[Insight]] event from your discard pile. After that event resolves, remove it from the game.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may cancel this token and draw another in its place. If you do, draw 1 card.

name: Agatha Crane
text:
[reaction] When your turn ends, if you sealed, canceled, or ignored 1 or more chaos tokens this round: Play a [[Spell]] or [[Insight]] event from your discard pile. After that event resolves, remove it from the game.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may cancel this token and draw another in its place. If you do, draw 1 card.

name: Ocula Obscura
text: Agatha Crane deck only. [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test, if no tokens are sealed here: Seal a non-symbol token revealed during this skill test on Ocula Obscura. (Limit once per phase.) Forced - When you would reveal a token from the chaos bag: Resolve the token sealed here instead, then release that token.

name: Glimpse the Void
text: Revelation - Put Glimpse the Void into play in your threat area. The first time you reveal 1 or more chaos tokens during each skill test, you must reveal 1 additional chaos token (and resolve its effects). [action]: Shuffle Glimpse the Void into your deck.

name: George Barnaby
text:
Your max hand size is equal to the number of facedown cards beneath George Barnaby. (Limit 5 cards.)
You may commit facedown cards beneath George Barnaby to skill tests as if they were in your hand.
[reaction] After you discard a card from your hand: Place it facedown beneath George Barnaby, then draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Draw 1 card.

name: Ready for Anything
text:
Play only as your first action.
Draw 1 card (2 cards instead if you drew an enemy this round). Then, heal 1 horror. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Hunter's Mark
text:
Fast. Attach to an enemy at your location. Limit 1 per enemy.
Investigators get +1 [combat] while fighting this enemy.
[reaction] When damage is dealt to attached enemy, discard Hunter's Mark: Deal 1 additional damage to that enemy. Any investigator may trigger this ability.

name: Correlate All Its Contents
text: Investigate. You may cancel the first chaos token revealed for this skill test, return it to the bag, and reveal a new one. If you succeed at this skill test, place 1 charge or secret on an asset controlled by an investigator at your location (if you succeed by exactly 1 or 3, place 2 charges or secrets on that asset instead).

name: Mob Connections
text:
Exceptional.
[action] Spend 2 resources: Draw the card attached to Mob Connections.
[reaction] When an [[Illicit]] asset you control is discarded from play, exhaust Mob Connections: Attach that asset to this card, facedown. Limit 1 attached asset.

name: Gatling Gun
text: Uses (12 ammo). [action] Spend 1-6 ammo: Fight. You get +X [combat] for this attack. The difficulty for this attack is equal to the combined fight values of all enemies at your location. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals X damage divided as you choose among enemies at your location. X is the amount of ammo spent as part of this ability's cost.

name: The Great Work
text:
Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. Purchase only at deck creation.
You earn 1 additional experience after each scenario of this campaign. If you are defeated, you are usurped by the homunculus (replace each signature card in your deck with a random basic weakness, flip this card, and swap it with your investigator for the remainder of the campaign).

flavor: You always wanted to be human.
name: Lost Homunculus
text: Cannot be chosen as a starting investigator. You cannot add, remove, or upgrade cards from your deck. You get +2 skill value while resolving abilities on [[Spell]] cards. Forced - When you are defeated: You are killed. [elder_sign] effect: +0. Draw 1 card.

name: Whispers of Doom
text: Parley. Choose a non-weakness enemy at your location and test [willpower] (3). This test gets +X difficulty, where X is that enemy's horror value. If you succeed, defeat that enemy (or deal it 3 damage instead if it is [[Elite]]). If you fail, place 1 doom on that enemy.

flavor: "Each block of clay hides all manner of fantastical things."
name: Lawrence Carlisle
text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you discard 1 or more cards from your hand during your turn, exhaust Lawrence Carlisle: Gain 1 resource.

name: Improvised Weapon
text: You may play Improvised Weapon from your discard pile. If you do, shuffle it into your deck after resolving its effects and draw 1 card. Fight. The attacked enemy gets -2 fight for this attack. (If you played Improvised Weapon from your discard pile, this attack deals +1 damage.)

name: Library Pass
text: [[Miskatonic]], [[Scholar]] deck only. Limit 1 per deck. [fast] During your turn, if there is no asset attached to Library Pass, spend 1 resource: Attach a [[Tome]] asset from your hand to this card. Attached asset takes up no slots. Limit 1 attached asset. Forced - When your turn ends: Place attached asset on the bottom of your deck.

name: True Awakening
text:
[[Blessed]], [[Chosen]], [[Drifter]] deck only.
Choose and resolve two of the following, in any order:
- Draw 2 cards.
- Discover 1 clue at your location.
- Heal 1 damage.
- Heal 1 horror.

name: Nose to the Grindstone
text:
[[Criminal]], [[Drifter]], [[Entrepreneur]] deck only.
[fast] During a skill test on a [[Tool]] asset, exhaust Nose to the Grindstone: You get +2 skill value for this skill test. If this skill test fails, either replenish 1 supply on that asset or gain 1 resource.

flavor: "'Publish or Perish,' they said. Perhaps we'll do both."
name: Archibald MacVeigh
text:
[[Assistant]], [[Reporter]], [[Scholar]] deck only. Uses (4 secrets).
You get +1 [intellect].
Secrets on assets you control may be spent as resources to pay for [[Insight]] events you play.
